resources.string:
"Hi! Welcome to our Memory Game!

Here are the rules.Upon clicking on "Start Game", a search bar will be shown. Input a URL and search for images.From the URL, 20 images will be downloaded.

After all images have been downloaded, select 6 images to be your playing cards, and press "Play" to start game play.Before pressing play, you can still change the URL to search for a new set of images. 

Upon pressing play, a playing grid will be shown with all cards facing down.Click on a card to flip it over. Click on another to find a match.If it is a match, the card stays facing up, otherwise, the card flips back.

The timer starts immediately once the playing grid loads, and ends when all pairs of cards are found."
